summary: "Gangnam Style" is a popular K-pop song by South Korean singer Psy, released in 2012. The song is about the wealthy lifestyle in the Gangnam district of Seoul. It became a global hit, reaching number two on the Billboard Hot 100 and topping charts in over 30 countries. The catchy beat and Psy's unique dance moves made the song and its music video go viral. It was the first YouTube video to hit one billion views. Even world leaders tried the dance, and the song showed how Korean culture was spreading worldwide.
title: Gangnam Style
